name: Mainnet deployment

title: 'Deploy contract to mainnet'
labels: deployment
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Prepare and deploy the contract to Stacks mainnet for production use.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Security audit completed
- [ ] Contract deployed to mainnet
- [ ] Frontend updated with mainnet address
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Monitoring set up

## Technical Notes
- Review contract for vulnerabilities
- Estimate deployment costs
- Update network configuration in frontend
- Test thoroughly on testnet first
